title: game won't open  it just flash back to nothing
body:
I need some help with my game guys.
when i clicked the game, it turn into a small loading window as normally, then after 5-10 sec, 
its gone!  its GONE!  IT JUST GONE!!! 
Important thing i do have to say three times 
see if anyone can help me to fix the problem

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you download the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi), launch it as Administrator and select reinstall.

Let me know if this helps.

thx man!!!        i just down load the toll and the game again,
did't even open the hextech toll yet and the game going good now !
